name: Five Night's at Freddy's Sister Location VR
name_original: Five Night's at Freddy's Sister Location VR
description:
This game currently only includes the Story Mode Demo and the full completed custom night.

If your hands do not show up, make sure you have the Steam Client open, then restart the game. If that does not work message me on Discord and I will try my best to help you.

---REQUIRMENTS---

  • Steam VR
  • Steam Client Installed and Open
  • A PCVR headset with two controllers (Vive,Oculus,etc.)
  • A GameJolt Account (optional)
    • To login you need your username and your game token. You can find your game token by clicking on your profile in the top right.
  • Room-Scale tracking
  • Minimum System Requirments:
    • OS: Windows 8
    • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or greater / AMD FX 8350 or greater
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD R9 390
    • Storage: 2+ GB available space

---DESCRIPTION---

Five Night's at Freddy's: Sister Location VR is my take on the original game adapted into VR.

Included in the game is the main Custom Night mode with it's 10 challenges and customizable AI difficulty, as well as all 5 nights with its minigames and extras such as:

  • Parts and Service Funtime Freddy
  • Ballora's Gallery minigame
  • The Immortal and the Restless
  • And a boss battle with Ennard
  • And much much more

Link to the Fnaf:SL VR discord: https://discord.gg/PMh8skn

Link to the GameJolt Page: https://gamejolt.com/games/FnafSLVR/438011

---CREDITS---

All rights go to Scott Cawthon, creator of Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location.
